title: Saft, Swallow, Previte with Iggy Pop - Loneliness Road (2017)
description: Jamie Saft, Steve Swallow, Bobby Previte with Iggy Pop Loneliness Road 2017 - RareNoise Records: RNR077 / RNR077LP http://www.rarenoiserecords.com/saft-swallow-previte http://www.rarenoiserecords.com/jukebox/ssp/lr/ * Jamie Saft : piano, organ * Steve Swallow: electric bass * Bobby Previte: drums * Iggy Pop : vocals (4, 9, 12) http://www.jamiesaft.com/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Swallow http://www.bobbyprevite.com/ http://www.iggypop.com/ Recorded and mixed direct to 2 track analog by Christian Castagno at Potterville International Sound, New York, USA, assisted by Vin Cin. Loneliness Road ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loneliness_Road Reviews ~~~~~~~ By George W. Harris http://www.jazzweekly.com/2017/07/todays-triosmumpbeak-tooth-jamie-saft-loneliness-road-joe-policastro-trio-screen-sounds-guymintus-trio-a-home-in-between/ [...] Pianist Jamie Saft brings together the legendary bassist Steve Swallow and conversant drummer Bobby Previte for a mix of classy post bop. There is rich thoughtfulness on sophisticated pieces like the glimmering “Ten Nights” and the elegant “Nainsook,” and Swallow adds his bass lines like a painter putting extra brush strokes on water colors as on the panoramic “Little Harbor” and the clever “Henbane” while the team gets rich and bluesy on “Pinkus.” The ringer of the collection is Iggy Pop; yes, that proto-punker comes in with a sandied and grandfatherly deep voice during the plodding “Don’t Lose Yourself,” the pensive “Loneliness Road” and the personal and harrowing “Everyday.” Iggy’s tone is always on key and adds crevices of gravitas to the pieces. Many colors on this mosaic. [...] -- By Dan McClenaghan http://www.allaboutjazz.com/loneliness-road-jamie-saft-steve-swallow-bobby-previte-rarenoiserecords-review-by-dan-mcclenaghan.php By Tim Owen By Doug Simpson https://www.audaud.com/jamie-saft-steve-swallow-bobby-previte-with-iggy-pop-loneliness-road-rarenoise-review-by-doug-simpson/ Cyriel Pluimakers (nl) http://www.jazzenzo.nl/?e=3845 Marc Van de Walle (nl) http://jazzandmo.be/recensie/james-saftsteve-swallowbobby-previteiggy-pop-loneliness-road/ Da Samuele Lepore (it) http://www.thenewnoise.it/jamie-saft-bobby-previte-steve-swallow-iggy-pop-loneliness-road/ Da Andrea Baroni (it) http://www.traccedijazz.it/index.php/recensioni/2908-jamie-saft,-bobby-previte,-steve-swallow-iggy-pop-loneliness-road Par Sophie Chambon (fr) Par Gilles Gaujarengues (fr) http://www.citizenjazz.com/Saft-Swallow-Previte-Pop.html Por Chelo (es)
